title: Check out the translation for "herb" on SpanishDictionary.com!

text:
herb [hɜːb] [ɜːb] (US)
herb
herb(
[)](/pronunciation/herb)
uhrb
A noun is a word referring to a person, animal, place, thing, feeling or idea (e.g. man, dog, house).
[noun](http://www.spanishdict.com/guide/masculine-and-feminine-nouns)
1. (botany)
a.
[la hierba](/translate/la%20hierba)
(f) means that a noun is feminine. Spanish nouns have a gender, which is either feminine (like la mujer or la luna) or masculine (like el hombre or el sol).
[(F)](http://www.spanishdict.com/guide/masculine-and-feminine-nouns)
She has a lot of herbs in her garden for both culinary and medicinal purposes.Tiene muchas hierbas en su jardín para propósitos tanto culinarios como medicinales.
